metadata.title: CVE-2021-31607 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In SaltStack Salt 2016.9 through 3002.6, a command injection vulnerabilityexists in the snapper module that allows for local privilege escalation ona minion. The attack requires that a file is created with a pathname thatis backed up by snapper, and that the master calls the snapper.difffunction (which executes popen unsafely).

criterions.comment: salt package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
